attributes.action: change the law so that future Prime Ministers can only serve two terms of office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned, assert that in order for the political climate in the UK to be lucid, fervent and relevant, it is necessary that our Prime Ministers are restricted to serving a maximum of two terms of office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
